name: PrimeData
tagline: Asia Science-first Customer Data & eXperience Platform for growth marketing and digital innovation
description:
PrimeData is the pioneering Analytical CDP from Vietnam, created by industry 15-year experts in Customer Experience, Digital & DX consulting, Scaled Data Analytics platform and Data Scientists for eCommerce, omni-channel retail, OTT/OTA, finance banking, real estate.

PrimeData enables experimentation-based growth marketing based on in-depth customer behavior analytics and unification from all online & offline channels.
